abstract: The Yahoo deal is unfolding in playbook form. Microsoft has mailed in its bear-hug letter, Yahoo has adopted a polite “just say no” posture, and now The New York Times has reported that the Microsoft board is about to authorize going “hostile” on Yahoo by authorizing a proxy contest to replace the Yahoo board. In the latest news, Yahoo announced late Tuesday that it has adopted a severance plan for all of its employees in case of a change of control of Yahoo.
